title: Terrag AI: AI-Powered Data Analytics Platform
description: Terrag AI: A Streamlit-based AI-powered data analytics app for intelligent insights from business datasets like customers, feedback, and sales data.

title: Dishly: Modern Recipe Management System
description: Dishly: A modern recipe management system with pantry tracking, social features, and an admin panel, built with PHP, MySQL, and modern CSS for a responsive UI.

title: Filesystem Time Machine: File System Monitoring & OS Visualization
description: Filesystem Time Machine: A powerful file system monitoring and version control application with interactive OS concepts visualization, built with React and FastAPI.
